issue.title: Color log output
issue.body:
This might need to be split into multiple commits, as I was aiming to 
1. improve the output readability
2. later I decided that I really disliked the TaskFactory, and inheritance in this case made creating tasks much simplier, and hopefully easier to test.

This PR needs it's own tests, and it needs to rework existing tests.

issue.title: Investigate ConcourseCI
issue.body:
I'd like to investigate ConcourseCI to see how it compares with SwarmCI.

I'd also like to update the readme, and really streamline and describe how SwarmCI differs from other CI implementations.

issue.title: Fix "Complexity" issue in swarmci/__init__.py
issue.body:
Cyclomatic complexity is too high in function build_tasks_hierarchy. (6)

https://codeclimate.com/github/ghostsquad/swarmci/swarmci/__init__.py#issue_5802fadbcce81f0001000019

issue.title: Stage runner result does not change exit code of application
issue.body:
if the stage runner returns false, we need to actually raise an exception to ensure we exit with a non-zero exit code.
https://github.com/ghostsquad/swarmci/blob/master/swarmci/__init__.py#L108

issue.title: Default image should be removed (or documented)
issue.body:
Default image should be removed (or documented)
https://github.com/ghostsquad/swarmci/blob/master/swarmci/__init__.py#L98

issue.title: "Task" is ambiguous
issue.body:
I think the term task within SwarmCI is a bit ambiguous. It means both the "exec commands" run within a container as well as the base class for Stages and Jobs.

https://github.com/ghostsquad/swarmci/blob/master/swarmci/task.py

issue.title: create_stages needs a bit more human-friendly error handling
issue.body: https://github.com/ghostsquad/swarmci/blob/master/swarmci/__init__.py#L22

issue.title: Runners aren't quite polymorphic
issue.body: The runners have an issue that they aren't entirely interchangeable like how I originally imagined them to be, and thus this will easily become spaghetti code if not fixed soon.

issue.title: Demo parameter is required
issue.body:
The code to run the demo should be should be cleaned up or removed.
Currently the demo is a required argument, and thus you can't run without it. :(

issue.title: remove clone from job object
issue.body:
https://github.com/ghostsquad/swarmci/blob/master/swarmci/job.py#L37

"Clone" should be just another "task", and should not be special. Example, of someone needs to first clone the repo:

```
tasks:
  - git clone ....
  - something else
```

Right now, clone isn't even implemented. So this is to suggest that the functionality should _not_ be implemented.

issue.title: Is that project is just for fun or will be continued after hackaton ?
issue.body:
Current progress looks great!
Do you plan  further extensions ?

issue.title: Fixes number list formatting in the README file.
issue.body:
For correct formatting a line-break is needed between the list and whatever precedes it.

Nice project by the way! 😸

issue.title: remove clone from job object
issue.body:
https://github.com/ghostsquad/swarmci/blob/master/swarmci/job.py#L37

"Clone" should be just another "task", and should not be special. Example, of someone needs to first clone the repo:

```
tasks:
  - git clone ....
  - something else
```

Right now, clone isn't even implemented. So this is to suggest that the functionality should _not_ be implemented.
